title: Celebrating Growth Milestones
description: Celebrate how far you've come and where you're headed together.

questions.text: Looking back, the biggest way I've grown is...
choices: My clarity about what I want in life

therapeutic.rationale: Recognizing personal growth builds confidence. Emotion-handlers improved regulation; communicators improved connection; confidence-builders improved self-worth; clarity-finders improved direction. Naming growth honors the journey.
therapeutic.whenDifferent: Different growth areas are both valid. You've each developed in your own ways.
therapeutic.whenSame: Shared growth areas show you've developed in similar directions.
therapeutic.journalPrompt: What's the biggest way you've grown? Does your partner know this about your journey?

questions.text: A growth milestone we've achieved together is...
choices: Creating a life we're proud of

therapeutic.rationale: Recognizing shared milestones strengthens the relationship narrative. Conflict-navigators improved resolution; trust-builders improved intimacy; challenge-supporters improved resilience; life-creators improved partnership. Celebrating milestones honors shared growth.
therapeutic.whenDifferent: Different milestone memories are both valid. You may highlight different aspects of your shared growth.
therapeutic.whenSame: Matched milestones create shared pride in what you've accomplished together.
therapeutic.journalPrompt: What growth milestone have you achieved as a couple? Have you celebrated it?

questions.text: What I'm most proud of in my personal growth is...

therapeutic.rationale: Pride in growth builds confidence. Fear-overcomers conquered obstacles; self-aware types gained insight; habit-builders created change; relationship-improvers enhanced connection. Feeling proud of growth motivates continued development.
therapeutic.whenDifferent: Different sources of pride are both valid. You've each accomplished meaningful growth.
therapeutic.whenSame: Shared pride creates aligned appreciation for the growth you've both achieved.
therapeutic.journalPrompt: What growth are you most proud of? Have you shared this with your partner?

questions.text: The next growth milestone I'm working toward is...
choices: Achieving a personal or career goal

therapeutic.rationale: Next milestones reveal future focus. Goal-achievers pursue accomplishment; resilience-builders pursue strength; relationship-deepeners pursue connection; balance-finders pursue peace. Naming next steps creates accountability and direction.
therapeutic.whenDifferent: Different next milestones are individual. Understanding your partner's goals helps you support them.
therapeutic.whenSame: Shared next milestones create opportunity for pursuing growth together.
therapeutic.journalPrompt: What's the next growth milestone you're working toward? How can your partner support you?

questions.text: Years from now, I hope we look back and see that we...
choices: Loved each other through it all

therapeutic.rationale: Long-term visions guide present choices. Continuous-growers value development; dream-supporters value encouragement; meaning-builders value creation; love-through-all types value connection. Sharing this vision aligns your trajectory.
therapeutic.whenDifferent: All these visions are beautiful and compatible. You can achieve all of them together.
therapeutic.whenSame: Shared vision creates aligned hope for your long-term future.
therapeutic.journalPrompt: What do you hope you'll see when you look back on your relationship years from now?
